Thank you market patrons!! Your support during COVID shutdown kept the lights on!

1642 is now back to normal bar business.

Tuesday - Thursday 6pm-1am // Friday - Saturday 6pm-2am // Sunday 6pm-midnight

A neighborhood watering hole that host locals & the music community nightly in Historic Filipinotown.

We need to revamp the old website.

In the meantime, check facebook and instagram to find out whats going on.

1642 West Temple Street
Los Angeles, CA 90026
